explanations.highSeverityAlerts: Active critical alerts are strong fraud precursors.
explanations.suddenBalanceShift: Rapid ledger swings suggest anomalous movement.
explanations.bankLineVariance: Volatility across bank lines feeds the risk score.
explanations.unusualVendors: New or risky vendors need human verification.
explanations.manualOverrides: Manual overrides weaken standard fraud controls.
